subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Daniela Merighetti earned the first World Cup victory of her career Saturday despite a broken left thumb, with Lindsey Vonn the runner-up in one of the season’s biggest downhills.
snippet: Daniela Merighetti earned the first World Cup victory of her career Saturday despite a broken left thumb, with Lindsey Vonn the runner-up in one of the season’s biggest downhills.
